org.hps.readout.ecal

Class TriggerDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.readout.ecal.TriggerableDriver
        • org.hps.readout.ecal.TriggerDriver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DummyTriggerDriver, FADCPrimaryTriggerDriver, FADCTriggerDriver, MollerTriggerDriver, NeutralPionTriggerDriver, SinglesTriggerDriver

    public abstract class TriggerDriver
extends TriggerableDriver
    Makes trigger decision and sends trigger to readout drivers. Prints triggers to file if file path specified. Writes trigger events to LCIO if file path specified. To implement: extend this class and write your own triggerDecision().

        public void setDeadTime(int deadTime)
        Set dead time; 0 for no dead time
        Parameters:
        deadTime - Minimum number of clock ticks between triggers

      • setPrescale

        public void setPrescale(int prescale)
        Set prescale. Only trigger on every Nth event that passes the trigger decision. The default is 1 (no prescale - trigger on every event).
        Parameters:
        prescale -
